duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comfort care to patients enabling them to remain at home with their loved ones
Work as a member of the hospice team to meet each patient’s unique physical, emotional, and spiritual needs
Help patients approach their final days with joy, peace, and dignity
Enhance the quality of someone’s life every day

education_certification.credential: Certified Nursing Assistant highly preferred. In states where licensure is not required, applicants must meet specific training and employment requirements.
